io.github.whippetdb.db.api

Interface TypeIO<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanIO, ByteBufferIO, BytesIO, CharsIO, FixedBytesIO, FixedCharsIO, IntIO, LongIO

    public interface TypeIO<T>
    Serialize/deserialize objects

    • Method Detail

      • dataType

        java.lang.Class<T> dataType()

      • isApplicable

        default boolean isApplicable(java.lang.Object o)
        Reccommended to override using instanceof!

      • convert

        MemArray convert(T obj,
                 MemDataArray tmpBuf)
        Convert object to memory. Implementation may choose between creating new instance of memory and writing to existing buffer, which one is faster. This is intended for representing a db key as memory chunk. If the type is variable-size (size() returns null), the size should be set through casting tmpBuf as MemDataBuffer.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to convert.
        tmpBuf - the buffer that may be written to and returned as the result.
        Returns:
        memory

      • writeObject

        void writeObject(T obj,
                 MemDataArray buf)
        Write object to memory. If the type is var-size, the size should be set through casting the buf as MemDataBuffer.
        Parameters:
        obj -
        buf -
